title.value: Генетико-популяционный анализ крупного рогатого скота черно-пестрой породы по микросателлитам ДНК
Genetic-population analysis of cattle of black-motley breed by microsatellites of DNA
Genetic-population analysis of cattle of black-motley breed by microsatellites of DNA

journal.title: Agriculture - Problems and Prospects : collection of scientific papers

person.name: Tanana, L.A., Grodno State Agrarian Univ. (Belarus)

abstract.value: On the basis of Polessky State University (Republic of Belarus) in research laboratory of biotechnologies has been carried out the comparative analysis of 11 microsatellite markers of DNA: BM1824, BM 2113. ETHIO, ETH225. ETH3, INRA023, SPS115, TGLA122, TGLA126, TGLA227, TGLA53, an estimation of level homozygote. Plural homozygote, frequencies of occurrence alleles variants sequences DNA among animals black-motley cattle. The researched populations are characterized by a high genetic variety on microsatellite loci that testifies to an opportunity of its use for certification, identification, acknowledgement of an origin of separate individuals and studying of black-motley large horned livestock breeds and populations genetic variety.
